content.question: “Reaganomics,” or supply-side economics, led to which of the following?

choices.label: A decline in unemployment and poverty
Greater tax revenues than government expenditures
Large increases in the incomes of wealthy Americans
An increase in appropriations for school lunches
Lower military expenditures than during the Carter administration

content.answer: Large increases in the incomes of wealthy Americans

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
